constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 8 (Wednesday, January 13, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SCHNEIDER:
H.R. 316.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H195]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: To direct the President to appoint a Medical Supplies Response Coordinator to coordinate the efforts of the Federal Government regarding the supply and distribution of certain supplies and equipment relating to COVID-19.
